## determineOverallRelease() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determines the overall release type from classification results. Returns the highest severity: forbidden &gt; major &gt; minor &gt; patch &gt; none.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function determineOverallRelease(results: ReadonlyArray<Pick<ClassifiedChange, 'releaseType'>>): ReleaseType;
```

</td><td>

</td><td>

Array of classified changes or classification results


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)

The highest severity release type
